episodes.title: Episode 1.1
episodes.description: Abducted by a Viking warlord after his father is killed in battle, young Uhtred embraces the Northern way of life.

episodes.title: Episode 1.2
episodes.description: Caught between his scheming uncle Ã†lfric and Viking warlord Ubba, Uhtred goes on the run and seeks out Alfred, the aspiring king.

episodes.title: Episode 1.3
episodes.description: Uhtred aligns himself with the newly crowned Alfred, but his commitment to the nascent king jeopardizes his bond with Brida.

episodes.title: Episode 1.4
episodes.description: Betrayed and falling into hostile hands, Uhtred's Danish brother Ragnar the Young scrambles to save his life.

episodes.title: Episode 1.5
episodes.description: After rescuing Mildrith, Uhtred joins the fierce Battle of Cynuit, defeating a formidable foe, only to have Odda the Younger claim the victory.

episodes.title: Episode 1.6
episodes.description: Uhtred catches the eye of a pagan queen, and his raiders become mercenaries for a Cornish king.

episodes.title: Episode 1.7
episodes.description: Forced to hide in the marshes after Viking invasion, Uhtred and Alfred reconcile, devising a plan to reclaim the kingdom.

episodes.title: Episode 1.8
episodes.description: Summoning Saxon forces to rally against the Vikings in Wessex, Uhtred and Alfred prepare for a decisive battle, but treachery awaits.
